body.para: Some window isn't getting displayed, or there is a bug in the window manager or surface flinger that is incorrectly keeping the screen frozen.
On Tue, Apr 26, 2011 at 3:22 AM, Suresh Chandra Pal < sureshchandra...@gmail.com> wrote:

quote.quotepara: I have added logs at some places in Gallery and BluetoothOppBtErrorActivity related classes. Following logs are from the first launch of Bluetooth Dialog till the orientation changes.
04-26 12:54:55.675 D/dalvikvm( 2171): GC_EXTERNAL_ALLOC freed 477K, 56% free 2566K/5703K, external 2024K/2108K, paused 115ms
04-26 12:54:55.750 D/dalvikvm( 447): GC_EXTERNAL_ALLOC freed 135K, 58% free 2748K/6471K, external 6890K/6903K, paused 104ms

04-26 12:54:56.621 D/BatteryService( 156): updateBattery level:72 scale:100 status:2 health:2 present:true voltage: 4021 temperature: 320 technology: Li-ion AC powered:false USB powered:true icon:17302213

Please let me know in case of anymore information is required.
On Tue, Apr 26, 2011 at 8:42 AM, Dianne Hackborn <hack...@android.com>wrote:
What do you see in the log?
On Mon, Apr 25, 2011 at 7:56 AM, Suresh Pal <sureshchandra...@gmail.com>wrote:
I have an issue in orientation change in the Gallery application. Following are the steps for this issue:

1. Turn Flight mode on. 2. Gallery > select an image ( such that its in full screen) > menu > share > bluetooth It will launch the Flight mode enable popup. 3. Now change the orientation. 4. If you will observe it will take a lot of time in changing orientation for the popup.

Note: 1. If you will change orientation of gallery app when the popup is not there, it will not take that much time. 2. If you will change orientation of same popup in other applications like contact etc - it will not take that much time.

Here some more points - 1. The Bluetooh popup is getting created in a BluetoothOppBtErrorActivity.java class. This class is not overriding onConfigurationChanged. 2. Gallery application's Gallery.java class overrides onConfigurationChanged method as follows:

I have absolute no idea, why the orientation change in gallery app is taking time. In my understanding, nothing wrong is there in the code. Please help me if someone have any idea. Also I have few questions : If there are say two activities A and B. Where A is front activity and does not override onConfigurationChanged method and but B overrides this method. then If I'll change the orientation : 1. Will the Android system immediately restart the Activity A and with the orientation changed? 2. If above is false then will the android system wait for the Activity B finish its onConfigurationChanged method. and then orientation for both activity are changed.
Please let me know in case of any other information is required from my side.
